method: Place the sprouts, apple, onion and walnuts in a large bowl and mix well to combine. Squeeze in the lemon juice and coat well to prevent the apple from browning.  For the dressing, add all ingredients into a jar and secure the lid on firmly. Shake well to combine, adding a little water if needed to loosen, and drizzle over the salad. Serve straight away.
ingredients: 250g/9oz Brussels sprouts, shredded in a food processor or finely sliced,  1 green apple, core removed, grated,  ½ red onion, finely sliced,  100g/3½oz walnuts, chopped,  ½ lemon, juice only ,  3 tbsp tahini,  3 tbsp lemon juice,  ¼ tsp cayenne pepper ,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
